mapper.select: select COUNT(1) from t_settle_accounts where house_owner = #{houseOwner , jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleted = 0
mapper.update: update t_settle_accounts set signing_status = #{signingStatus} , modified_date = #{modifiedDate}, modified_user_id = #{modifiedUserId} where id = #{id}
